steps.name: Given  User is on POST Method with endpoint "baseURL/batches"
When  User sends the POST request with already available batch name in the db
Then  User receive 400 Bad request status code.
And  Recieves the following response {"errorCode": "DUPLICATE_ENTITY","errorMessage": "cannot create batch , since already exists"}
